CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE

NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE
SNOW WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT

ICE ACCUMULATION AROUND A TRACE
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION NEAR 100 PERCENT

SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
